content.raw:
Nice plotting tool.

I'm ignoring performance issues right now. Numerous visuals with the same geometry can be handled with instanced geometry in OGRE. Instanced geometry falls outside the scope of this work.

I think your 3d plotting may work better now. I get 60fps with line list. https://youtu.be/egWAMbU7f6Y
